column5:
NTA

Never feel bad for pranking a racist, even if they're family

Complete opposite at my store

We've hired 4 new faces in my department alone, and I've seen dozens of others in other departments, with interviews still being conducted
I'd love the QR codes for these
I'm not sure if mine has even shipped yet

I've found that even then, nobody really cares

Just for me, at least

Makes me wonder if they'll care when it actually happens
